oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Con Seaton's Ida Red"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: horses; Savannah, Tennessee; White, John H., Sr.; portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Notes on front: [Typed] "'CON SEATON'S IDA RED' - Dec. 1, 1962 Christmas Parade - Savannah, Tenn. - Foaled May 18, 1958 - Full Sister to Dr. Roberts' 'Big Man' - The dam (mother) is IDA RED-440428" - [Handwritten] "I am 72 years old - To My friend Geo. W." -- Notes on back: "John H. White, Sr. (born Nov. 16, 1890) - friend of Lt. Lee from middle Tenn. - who was at 1953 Republican Convention."
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Item scanned by John Yackulics; Description by Margie Robertson
